PERSONA:
josé martínez is a 68-year-old married hispanic man born in the united states. he holds a postgraduate degree and is a devout protestant, attending religious services more than once a week. josé identifies as a born-again or evangelical christian and his religious beliefs shape his conservative political ideology.

a resident of a metropolitan area in the middle atlantic region, josé is a registered republican voter with a family income between $70,000 and $80,000, placing him in the middle-income tier. despite his frequent internet usage, josé is not actively involved in volunteerism.

with his white racial background and hispanic ethnicity originating from another country, josé takes pride in his american citizenship. he values traditional family values and is committed to his marriage. josé's life revolves around his faith, which influences his conservative worldview and allegiance to the republican party.
